events.message: I received the wrong size of the jacket I ordered and would like to request a refund.
The case has been classified under the Refund category based on the customer's request.
A customer service representative has been assigned to handle the refund request.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear you received the wrong size. I'm here to help you with your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the jacket you received, so we can start processing your refund?
Here is my order number 123456789 and the photo attached shows the jacket with a tag for size L instead of M.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund immediately and you will receive a confirmation email shortly.
I appreciate the quick response and look forward to the refund. Thank you for your assistance.
The refund process has been completed successfully and the amount should be credited back to your account within 5 to 7 business days.
We are checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory with your case.
Since your refund was confirmed, we are closing this case now. Please contact us if you need further help.
